Fun fact: Cockroaches use the air around them to figure out where a predator is coming from and run. So they will run away from incoming air currents. However, because of this, they're very easy to trick with a common household appliance... a vacuum cleaner. They'll feel the air current behind them, because... you know... a vacuum... and run right INTO the suction.
